page.title: 16A Doctor in Sutton on Sea.
page.content: One of the doctors in Sutton is{Dr.C. {Turner}whose surgery is on Trusthorpe Rd.He has been a doctor here for 22 years.He used to live in Yorkshire and has thought of moving again but likes Sutton.{Dr Turner's}surgeries are twice a day. Medicine has changed since he began and now we use pills and tablets more.He sees 30_100 patients a day.{Dr Turner}wanted to be a doctor because his job would be different each day.He studied to be a doctor in Leeds.He finds children better patients.He thinks there is more illness than there used to be in Sutton.He sends people to hospital in emergencies a lot.With there being more old people there is more work to do.{Dr Turner}works 24 hrs a day.The other doctors in Sutton are{Drs Hirst and{Anderson}whose surgery is in Cromer Avenue.
